actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to increase the size of the Committee on Labor and Human Resources and to make certain changes in the Majority membership.

summary.text: Amends rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to increase from 16 to 18 the membership of the Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Appoints the Honorable John P. East, of North Carolina, and the Honorable Paula Hawkins, of Florida, to such Committee.

titles.title: A resolution to increase the size of the Committee on Labor and Human Resources and to make certain changes in the Majority membership.
